content: DD 160 Core drill Compact but powerful diamond coring machine for rig-based concrete coring from 25-202 mm (31/32 - 7-15/16”) in diameter ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Diamond coring- - - ### FEATURES:Features Exceptionally user-friendly thanks to intuitively-designed features and controls Sturdy three-speed gearing for outstanding concrete coring performance across the entire diameter range Power control LED – shows even inexperienced users how to achieve the optimum drilling speed and maximize core bit life Choice of a high-grade drill stand with many useful features or simple, very compact drill stand with basic functionality Hilti BI+ quick-release connection lets you change core bits in seconds - no tools required (keyless system) Applications Rig-based wet drilling in concrete for pipe penetrations in plumbing, heating and air conditioning installations Stitch drilling for cable trays and ventillation ducts Drilling blind holes for large-diameter anchors, reinforcing bars and the installation of railings and barriers For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Diameter range: 31/32 - 7-15/16 in Drilling stand: Baseplate dimensions and system weight based on usage of SFL stand Base material: Concrete Technical Data | Diameter range | 31/32 - 7-15/16 in | Drilling stand | Baseplate dimensions and system weight based on usage of SFL stand | Base material | Concrete | Operation mode | Rig-based drilling system | Number of gears | 3 | No load RPM | gear 1: 460 rpm; gear 2: 760 rpm; gear 3: 1690 rpm | Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery | 22.7 lb | Weight of complete system | 36 lb | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 17.7 x 7.7 x 12.4 in | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 93 dB (A) | 1 | Tri. vibr. value for drilling into concrete (wet) with diamond core A (ah,DD) | 4 m/s² | Tri. vibr. value for drilling into concrete (wet) (ah,DD) - Corebit A | PS/PL | Corner accessibility | 2.1 in | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 3496302 - Anchor/vacuum base w/pump pkg DD 160 BI - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DD 160 120V Diamond coring tool - 1x Gardena water connector (female) - 1x BI+ (M27x1.5) Chuck - 1x M16 Jack screw assy - 1x Drilling stand DD-ST 160 CTL - 1x DD VP-U 120V US Vacuum pump - 1x Adapter NEMA 5-20P / 5-15P - 3496301 - Anchor/vacuum base pkg DD 160 BI - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DD 160 120V Diamond coring tool - 1x Gardena water connector (female) - 1x BI+ (M27x1.5) Chuck - 1x Drilling stand DD-ST 160 CTL - 1x Adapter NEMA 5-20P / 5-15P - 3551057 - DD160 Vacuum base core rig w/bits, pump - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DD 160 120V Diamond coring tool - 1x Gardena water connector (female) - 1x BI+ (M27x1.5) Chuck - 3x Connection end BI - 1x Core bit barrel 2x17 P Universal - 1x Core bit barrel 3x17 P Universal - 1x Core bit barrel 4x17 P Universal - 1x Drilling stand DD-ST 160 CTL - 1x DD VP-U 120V US Vacuum pump - 1x Adapter NEMA 5-20P / 5-15P - 3496543 - Anchor base pkg DD 160 BI - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DD 160 120V Diamond coring tool - 1x Gardena water connector (female) - 1x BI+ (M27x1.5) Chuck - 1x Drilling stand DD-ST 160 SFL - 1x Adapter NEMA 5-20P / 5-15P - 3550445 - DD 160 VACUUM BASE + 3 P UNIV BITS - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DD 160 120V Diamond coring tool - 1x Gardena water connector (female) - 1x BI+ (M27x1.5) Chuck - 3x Connection end BI - 1x Core bit barrel 2x17 P Universal - 1x Core bit barrel 3x17 P Universal - 1x Core bit barrel 4x17 P Universal - 1x Drilling stand DD-ST 160 CTL - 1x Adapter NEMA 5-20P / 5-15P - 3551056 - DD160 Anchor base core rig w/bits - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DD 160 120V Diamond coring tool - 1x Gardena water connector (female) - 1x BI+ (M27x1.5) Chuck - 3x Connection end BI - 1x Core bit barrel 2x17 P Universal - 1x Core bit barrel 3x17 P Universal - 1x Core bit barrel 4x17 P Universal - 1x Drilling stand DD-ST 160 SFL - 1x Adapter NEMA 5-20P / 5-15P
